links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1).
formula: a(n) = -3/2(-1)^n+13/2. a(n) = 8*(n mod 2)+5*[(n+1) mod 2]. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Oct 20 2006a(n) = a(n-2) for n > 1; a(0) = 5, a(1) = 8. G.f.: (5+8*x)/((1-x)*(1+x)).  - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 01 2010a(n) = 3*(n mod 2) + 5. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 14 2014
prog: (MAGMA) [ 3*(n mod 2) + 5 : n in [0..50] ]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 14 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 11 1996
